00011 // skin.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "material.h"
00014 // Skin Class Declarations
00015 class Skin : public Material {
00016 public:
00017         Skin(Reference<Texture<float> > bump) : bumpMap(bump) { }
00018         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const;
00019         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap;
00020 };
00021 
00022 // Skin Method Definitions
00023 BSDF *Skin::GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const {
00024         // Declare skin coefficients
00025         static float diffuse[3] = {  0.428425f,  0.301341f,  0.331054f};
00026         static float xy0[3] =     { -1.131747f, -1.016939f, -0.966018f};
00027         static float z0[3] =      { -1.209182f, -1.462488f, -1.222419f};
00028         static float e0[3] =      {  6.421658f,  3.699932f,  3.524889f};
00029         static float xy1[3] =     { -0.546570f, -0.643533f, -0.638934f};
00030         static float z1[3] =      {  0.380123f,  0.410559f,  0.437367f};
00031         static float e1[3] =      {  3.685044f,  4.266495f,  4.539742f};
00032         static float xy2[3] =     { -0.998888f, -1.020153f, -1.027479f};
00033         static float z2[3] =      {  0.857998f,  0.703913f,  0.573625f};
00034         static float e2[3] =      { 64.208486f, 63.919687f, 43.809866f};
00035         static Spectrum xy[3] = { Spectrum(xy0), Spectrum(xy1), Spectrum(xy2) };
00036         static Spectrum z[3] = { Spectrum(z0), Spectrum(z1), Spectrum(z2) };
00037         static Spectrum e[3] = { Spectrum(e0), Spectrum(e1), Spectrum(e2) };
00038         // Allocate _BSDF_, possibly doing bump-mapping with _bumpMap_
00039         DifferentialGeometry dgs;
00040         if (bumpMap)
00041                 Bump(bumpMap, dgGeom, dgShading, &dgs);
00042         else
00043                 dgs = dgShading;
00044         BSDF *bsdf = BSDF_ALLOC(BSDF)(dgs, dgGeom.nn);
00045         bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(Lafortune)(Spectrum(diffuse), 3, xy, xy, z, e,
00046                 BxDFType(BSDF_REFLECTION | BSDF_DIFFUSE)));
00047         return bsdf;
00048 }
00049 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Material * CreateMaterial(const Transform &xform,
00050                 const TextureParams &mp) {
00051         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap = mp.GetFloatTexture("bumpmap", 0.f);
00052         return new Skin(bumpMap);
00053 }
